00007 #include "Accelerometer.h"
00008 #include "AnalogModule.h"
00009 #include "Utility.h"
00010 #include "WPIStatus.h"
00011 
00015 void Accelerometer::InitAccelerometer()
00016 {
00017     m_voltsPerG = 1.0;
00018     m_zeroGVoltage = 2.5;
00019 }
00020 
00027 Accelerometer::Accelerometer(UINT32 channel)
00028 {
00029     m_analogChannel = new AnalogChannel(channel);
00030     m_allocatedChannel = true;
00031     InitAccelerometer();
00032 }
00033 
00040 Accelerometer::Accelerometer(UINT32 slot, UINT32 channel)
00041 {
00042     m_analogChannel = new AnalogChannel(slot, channel);
00043     m_allocatedChannel = true;
00044     InitAccelerometer();
00045 }
00046 
00053 Accelerometer::Accelerometer(AnalogChannel *channel)
00054 {
00055     if (channel == NULL)
00056     {
00057         wpi_fatal(NullParameter);
00058     }
00059     else
00060     {
00061         m_analogChannel = channel;
00062         InitAccelerometer();
00063     }
00064     m_allocatedChannel = false;
00065 }
00066     
00070 Accelerometer::~Accelerometer()
00071 {
00072     if (m_allocatedChannel)
00073     {
00074         delete m_analogChannel;
00075     }
00076 }
00077 
00085 float Accelerometer::GetAcceleration()
00086 {
00087     return (m_analogChannel->GetAverageVoltage() - m_zeroGVoltage) / m_voltsPerG;
00088 }
00089 
00098 void Accelerometer::SetSensitivity(float sensitivity)
00099 {
00100     m_voltsPerG = sensitivity;
00101 }
00102 
00110 void Accelerometer::SetZero(float zero)
00111 {
00112     m_zeroGVoltage = zero;
00113 }
00114 
00120 double Accelerometer::PIDGet()
00121 {
00122     return GetAcceleration();
00123 }
